details.title: Fast factorised backprojection algorithm in elliptical polar coordinate for one-stationary bistatic very high frequency/ultrahigh frequency ultra-wideband synthetic aperture radar with arbitrary motion

kwd: ultrahigh frequency ultra-wideband synthetic aperture radar imaging
one-stationary bistatic very high frequency synthetic aperture radar imaging

authors.affiliation: Coll. of Electron. Sci. & Eng., Nat. Univ. of Defense Technol., Changsha, China
authors.name: Hongtu Xie

authors.affiliation: Coll. of Electron. Sci. & Eng., Nat. Univ. of Defense Technol., Changsha, China
authors.name: Daoxiang An

authors.affiliation: Coll. of Electron. Sci. & Eng., Nat. Univ. of Defense Technol., Changsha, China
authors.name: Xiaotao Huang

authors.affiliation: Coll. of Electron. Sci. & Eng., Nat. Univ. of Defense Technol., Changsha, China
authors.name: Xiangyang Li

authors.affiliation: Coll. of Electron. Sci. & Eng., Nat. Univ. of Defense Technol., Changsha, China
authors.name: Zhimin Zhou

details.abstract: The precise disposal of azimuth variance of range cell migrations and motion errors in the one-stationary bistatic very high frequency/ultrahigh frequency ultra-wideband synthetic aperture radar imaging is a real challenge for efficient frequency-domain algorithms, but can be precisely managed by time-domain approaches. In this study, a novel bistatic fast factorised backprojection (BFFBP) algorithm is presented, which can deal with these two effects accurately and achieve the computational performance in parity with frequency-domain algorithms. First, the imaging geometry with arbitrary motion in elliptical polar coordinate is provided, and the analytical expression of the bistatic backprojection algorithm in this coordinate system is derived, which provides a theory basis for the proposed algorithm. Then, based on the subaperture imaging geometry, the sampling requirements considering motion errors is deduced, which offers the optimal tradeoff between the imaging quality and computational speed. The advantage of using elliptical polar coordinate system for implementing the BFFBP algorithm is analysed. Finally, the implementation and computational burden of the BFFBP algorithm are discussed. Simulation results are shown to prove the correctness of the theory analysis and validity of the proposed approach.

ieee.title: Research on Spatial Resolution of One-Stationary Bistatic Ultrahigh Frequency Ultrawidebeam–Ultrawideband SAR Based on Scattering Target Wavenumber Domain Support
ieee.displayText: Hongtu Xie, Daoxiang An, Xiaotao Huang, Zhimin Zhou, "Research on Spatial Resolution of One-Stationary Bistatic Ultrahigh Frequency Ultrawidebeam–Ultrawideband SAR Based on Scattering Target Wavenumber Domain Support", Selected Topics in Applied Earth Observations and Remote Sensing IEEE Journal of, vol. 8, pp. 1782-1798, 2015, ISSN 1939-1404.

ieee.title: Fast Time-Domain Imaging in Elliptical Polar Coordinate for General Bistatic VHF/UHF Ultra-Wideband SAR With Arbitrary Motion
ieee.displayText: Hongtu Xie, Daoxiang An, Xiaotao Huang, Zhimin Zhou, "Fast Time-Domain Imaging in Elliptical Polar Coordinate for General Bistatic VHF/UHF Ultra-Wideband SAR With Arbitrary Motion", Selected Topics in Applied Earth Observations and Remote Sensing IEEE Journal of, vol. 8, pp. 879-895, 2015, ISSN 1939-1404.

ieee.title: A fast back-projection algorithm for bistatic forward-looking low frequency UWB SAR imaging
ieee.displayText: Dong Feng, Hongtu Xie, Daoxiang An, Xiaotao Huang, "A fast back-projection algorithm for bistatic forward-looking low frequency UWB SAR imaging", Radar Symposium (IRS) 2015 16th International, pp. 1135-1140, 2015.

ieee.title: Efficient Raw Signal Generation Based on Equivalent Scatterer and Subaperture Processing for One-Stationary Bistatic SAR Including Motion Errors
ieee.displayText: Hongtu Xie, Daoxiang An, Xiaotao Huang, Zhimin Zhou, "Efficient Raw Signal Generation Based on Equivalent Scatterer and Subaperture Processing for One-Stationary Bistatic SAR Including Motion Errors", Geoscience and Remote Sensing IEEE Transactions on, vol. 54, pp. 3360-3377, 2016, ISSN 0196-2892.

ieee.title: Processing bistatic forward-looking spotlight SAR data using fast backprojection algorithm
ieee.displayText: Hongtu Xie, Daoxiang An, Xiaotao Huang, Zhimin Zhou, Tian Jin, "Processing bistatic forward-looking spotlight SAR data using fast backprojection algorithm", Synthetic Aperture Radar (APSAR) 2015 IEEE 5th Asia-Pacific Conference on, pp. 391-395, 2015.

ieee.title: Two-dimensional wavenumbers analysis of one-stationary bistatic circular SAR
ieee.displayText: Hongtu Xie, Daoxiang An, Xiaotao Huang, Zhimin Zhou, "Two-dimensional wavenumbers analysis of one-stationary bistatic circular SAR", Radar Conference 2015 IEEE, pp. 359-363, 2015.

ieee.title: Spatial resolution analysis of low frequency UWB one-stationary bistatic SAR
ieee.displayText: Hongtu Xie, Daoxiang An, Xiaotao Huang, Zhimin Zhou, Tian Jin, "Spatial resolution analysis of low frequency UWB one-stationary bistatic SAR", Synthetic Aperture Radar (APSAR) 2015 IEEE 5th Asia-Pacific Conference on, pp. 10-14, 2015.

ieee.title: Spatial resolution analysis of low frequency UWB SAR
ieee.displayText: Hongtu Xie, Daoxiang An, Xiaotao Huang, Zhimin Zhou, "Spatial resolution analysis of low frequency UWB SAR", Radar Symposium (IRS) 2015 16th International, pp. 1076-1081, 2015.

ieee.title: Focusing one-stationary bistatic circular SAR data using fast backprojection algorithm
ieee.displayText: Hongtu Xie, Daoxiang An, Xiaotao Huang, Zhimin Zhou, "Focusing one-stationary bistatic circular SAR data using fast backprojection algorithm", Radar Symposium (IRS) 2015 16th International, pp. 1147-1152, 2015.
